name: AustraliaPostDecoded
summary: Decoded Australia Post customer barcode information.

properties.name: CustomerInfo
properties.summary: Gets the customer information field (may be empty for Standard format).

properties.name: CustomerInfoEncoding
properties.summary: Gets the customer information encoding table, if present.

properties.name: IsCustomerInfoAmbiguous
properties.summary: Gets whether the customer information encoding was ambiguous.

properties.name: Value
properties.summary: Gets the concatenated payload (DPID + customer info).
